price: an Arabic Qur’an, free of flaws and contradictions, so that they may be conscious of Allah.
arabic: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ
